title: Let's have a holiday
brief_description: Join the Silly Billies as they go on holiday to an amazing place called FUN FUN FUN. Once there you’ll see the Ashton Super Acrobats, play games and dance and sing. Songs on the video include: “The Water safety song”, “The Silly Billies song”, “Fun fun fun”, “The Boogie Woogie”, “Aussie rap”, “Miranda the Aussie kangaroo”, “The Electric crocodile”, “Dick the duck”, “Boxo the fox”, “Raise your hands and be happy”, “We can count to 20”, “Making up my milkshake” and “Ophelia the fairy”. Swimming coach Laurie Lawrence leads the children in “The Water safety song”.
